job.title: Software Engineer - New Grad
job.description: at goat group the engineering team is an integral part of our dynamic company by joining the team your skills will be front and center working alongside other passionate individuals to solve problems and build software from launching compelling new consumer experiences tackling global logistics challenges to scaling infrastructure to facilitate our rapid growth technology is essential to driving our vision forward the work you do will change the way the world shops while also empowering entrepreneurs including individual sellers brands and boutiquesltbrgtltbrgtwe are looking for a new gradlevel engineer with high potential to help implement new features in one of our many backend applications as an entrylevel contributor on a small team you will learn and demonstrate the development practices and philosophies required to support both a monolithic ruby on rails app at the heart of the business and out a new more scalable servicedriven architectureltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtin this role you willltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltulgtltligtlearn adopt and demonstrate goats development practices and philosophiesltligtltligtimplement discrete changes and features often within a single application or codebaseltligtltligtwrite code that is correct readable and consistent with existing patternsltligtltligtensure that your contributions are maintainable stable welltested and ontimeltligtltligtsupport in troubleshooting issues and bugs particularly related to changes you have madeltligtltligtcommunicate clearly with other engineers and product managersltligtltligtbe a helpful and supportive presence on the teamltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltulgtltstronggtltugtwe are looking forltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltulgtltligtbs degree in a relevant technical field preferredltligtltligt years of internship experience developing in ruby php java python or goltligtltligtinternship experience with common web application patterns and frameworks rails symfony spring etcltligtltligtexperience developing features in an agile productdriven workflow qa analytics product frontend and mobile engineers ltligtltligtfamiliar and comfortable with the technologies the tradeoffs and the design patterns emerging in web servicesltligtltligta quick learner a selfstarter able to work independently and youre willing and able to handle the pressures of an increasing level of responsibilityltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltulgtgoat is the global platform for the greatest products from the past present and future since its founding in goat has become the leading and most trusted sneaker marketplace in the world through its unique positioning between the primary and resale markets the company offers styles across various time periods on its digital platforms and in its retail locations while delivering products to over million members across countriesltbrgtltbrgtthe company is backed by strategic investor foot locker inc as well as some of the leading names in venture capital including d capital partners accel andreessen horowitz index ventures matrix partners upfront ventures webb investment network and y combinatorltbrgtltbrgtwe encourage you to apply even if you feel unsure about whether you meet every single requirement we look for people who are passionate about what we do not just those who check off all the boxesltbrgtltbrgtgoat group will consider for employment all qualified applicants including those with criminal histories in a manner consistent with the requirements of applicable state and local laws including the city of los angeles fair chance initiative for hiring ordinance if applicable if you are a california resident please review our california privacy rights notice for job applicants
